name: Heart Battle
description:
In this world you are not on top of the food chain. You have no weapon and the minions of the Star Emperor are coming after you. The only way to stop the demons is to absorb heart power. The attacks won't stop coming so you must dodge meteors, bombs, crystal shards, and even spaceships to survive.

Features 20 projectile based bullet-hell light fights spread across 5 different chapters.
